title: Leading brands on Facebook from Indonesia 2017 , by number of fans
yAxis: Number of fans on Facebook in millions
summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Number of fans on Facebook in millions for 10 number of Months.
The maximum Number of fans on Facebook in millions 19.99 is found at Month Mario Teguh and the minimum is found at Liputan6 where Month is 8.19.
The lowest value at Month Liputan6 is 2.44x times less than the highest value at Mario Teguh.
min_summary: This is a bar chart representing Month in the x axis and Number of fans on Facebook in millions in the y axis.
The Number of fans on Facebook in millions is highest at Month Mario Teguh and lowest at Month Liputan6.
mid_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Number of fans on Facebook in millions for 10 number of Months.
The maximum Number of fans on Facebook in millions 19.99 is found at Month Mario Teguh and the minimum is found at Liputan6 where Month is 8.19.
The lowest value at Month Liputan6 is 2.44x times less than the highest value at Mario Teguh.
max_summary: This is a bar chart representing Month in the x axis and Number of fans on Facebook in millions in the y axis.
Month Mario Teguh has the highest Number of fans on Facebook in millions and Liputan6 has the lowest Number of fans on Facebook in millions.
The difference of Number of fans on Facebook in millions between the highest and lowest Month is 11.8.
The Month Mario Teguh has the highest Number of fans on Facebook in millions, followed by DRAWING PENCIL, and Kompas.com. Down to the Month Liputan6 which is the lowest.
The Number of fans on Facebook in millions has reduced over the past 10 Months.
The Month Mario Teguh has 1.88 times more Number of fans on Facebook in millions than average.
Summing up the values of all Months, we get total 106.49.
